info.title: Blackbaud FENXT Payable
info.description: Blackbaud Financial Edge NXT is a comprehensive cloud-based accounting software solution built specifically for nonprofits. Use the Payables connector to manage invoices, vendors, purchase orders and related entities found within The Financial Edge NXT.

403.description: Returned when the user does not have permission to view box numbers.

APApi.AttachmentSummaryCollection.description: Fetching data all at once quickly becomes unmanageable. The collection entity helps by returning paginated chunks of large data sets. This entity includes helpful metadata and properties to paginate and iterate through the data.

APApi.NewInvoice.description: An object that represents the invoice to create.

name.description: The name of the attachment. Character limit: 150.

media_type.description: User-defined category of this attachment. Available values are the entries in the Media Type table for the parent record. Use the value types defined in /mediaTypes

url.description: The URL for the attachment. This is required for link attachments and ignored for physical attachments.

file.description: The binary contents of the file attachment.  This is required for physical attachments and ignored for link attachments.

file_name.description: The file name for the attachment. This is required for physical attachments and ignored for link attachments.

type.description: The type of the line item.  Currently, only Regular line items is supported.

description.description: The description of the line item.

vendor_part_number.description: The vendor part number of the line item.

deliver_to.description: The staff member to deliver to for the line item.

post_status.description: The post status for the line item.

notes.description: Internal notes of the line item.

comments.description: External notes for the line item.
